weapons.name: Wardbreaker Blade
weapons.description: Forged from black steel tempered by arcane fires, this longsword radiates disruptive energy that unsettles magical wards. Each swing reverberates with the echo of The Unyielding Fang’s unwavering resolve, marking it as a weapon of defiance.

weapons.name: Joe Rits Balladstring
weapons.description: Forged from black steel tempered by arcane fires, this longsword radiates disruptive energy that unsettles magical wards. Each swing reverberates with the echo of The Unyielding Fang’s unwavering resolve, marking it as a weapon of defiance.

items.description: DOES NOT WORK
DOES NOT WORK
DOES NOT WORK

Encased in a small, frost-kissed flask that seems carved from enchanted ice, Frostbeard’s Brew is a relic of ancient Norse magic and forgotten frost giants. The flask itself is a work of art—etched with archaic runes and intricate patterns that mimic the swirling forms of winter storms. Its surface is perpetually encrusted with delicate, crystalline frost that glitters under even the faintest light, hinting at the brew’s potent, icy nature. Inside, the mysterious ale glows with a spectral blue light, swirling in mesmerizing patterns that evoke the aurora borealis. Wisps of ethereal mist occasionally escape from the opening, carrying with them the faint sound of a distant, echoing wind. The liquid’s deep, rich hue suggests a complexity of flavors and magical properties—one sip promises both invigorating battle fervor and the chill of ancient winters. Surrounded by a backdrop of a rugged Norse landscape—towering, snow-dusted mountains and swirling blizzards—the flask seems to capture the very essence of winters power and beauty. This brew, said to be distilled in the forgotten halls of frost giants, offers the drinker a temporary resistance to cold and a surge of melee might. However, the lingering effects of the ale impose a subtle, almost haunting chill, as if a fragment of the frost giant’s ancient essence remains forever within the drinker’s veins. Rendered in a detailed, atmospheric style, Frostbeard’s Brew embodies the duality of warmth and frost—a magical libation that is as much a blessing as it is a warning from the icy realms of old.

characters.description: A master of magic and a fearless knight sworn to protect Gelonus. Akron Sildor is a legendary figure known for his unyielding dedication to the kingdom. He stands as a bastion against darkness and danger.

A master of magic and a fearless knight sworn to protect Gelonus. Akron Sildor is a legendary figure known for his unyielding dedication to the kingdom. He stands as a bastion against darkness and danger.
The goddess of beauty Aphrodite is a figure of intrigue and desire. Her presence in the world is a curious one. Some claim she has the power to enchant and transform those who meet her eye.

This mischievous creature roams the shadows of Gelonus. Its small form and deceptive nature make it both an enigma and a threat. Little is known about its true intentions, but its actions carry great consequences.
The queen of Gelonus, Aylin Brightenloof is a strong and wise leader who carries the heavy burden of governance with grace. She stands as the heart of the kingdom, beloved and respected by all.
Boris The Great is a revered knight known for his tactical brilliance and formidable strength. His reputation as a protector of Gelonus has earned him the loyalty of many.
Donat Ward, known as the Hand of the King, is a knight entrusted with protecting the royal family. He is a loyal and determined protector, always ready to defend the kingdom.
Fey Redwood is a half-elf knight with striking red hair. Known for her swift movements and sharp wit, she is an adept fighter and a fierce protector of Gelonus.

Gidion Solerga, a financial backer in Gelonus, is an influential figure with a network of connections. Known for his blue masks, he has a mysterious air and is often seen in the company of the kingdom’s elite.
The God of Liminality is a powerful and enigmatic figure from Arcadia. Known for his ability to control thresholds and transitions, he plays a critical role in the balance between worlds.
Hei Bai is a mysterious entity tied to the Spirit Realm. With his presence, he brings both fear and awe. His true nature is unknown, but he is closely connected to the kingdom’s spiritual balance.
Hoofdpiet is a member of the Sinterklaas order. Known for his connection to coal and his relentless pursuit of justice, he is a fierce protector of Gelonus.
Irving Alric is a master of science with an expertise in fire-based technologies. His experiments have led to revolutionary discoveries, although his methods often raise ethical concerns.
Iwan Warrick is the head of the City Watch in Gelonus. A disciplined warrior, he ensures the safety of the people while dealing with threats from both within and beyond the kingdom’s borders.
Jahvis Jundruk is a captain known as the Master of the Sea. He commands respect on the water, and his knowledge of naval combat makes him a vital asset to Gelonus’s defense.
Joe Rits is a traveler and bard known for his songs of adventure. His tales have spread throughout Gelonus, making him a beloved figure among the common folk.

A tamed Owlbear in leather armor (AC 14, HP 63) fights with beak and claws, and as a special trait it can make a claw attack as a reaction against anyone who strikes its rider.

A sleek, jet‑black ring crafted from obsidian, said to mute the sounds around its wearer. Once worn, it grants near-perfect silence, a prized ability for sneaking into the most secure areas of the Sanctum.

locations.description: ArcaneBoreMKVI: In the spectral gloom of the Spirit Realm, amidst forests where the mist clings to the trunks of towering, gnarled trees, lies the ArcaneBore MKVI, its glowing drill-head a beacon of purpose and danger.
AzmosRoots: A mechanical marvel used to delve into the unknown.
A mechanical marvel used to delve into the unknown.

Beneath the waves, beyond mortal reach, lies Atlantis—a legendary city of towering spires, ancient wisdom, and unfathomable depths, illuminated by glowing corals and swirling schools of luminescent fish. Once a thriving empire of magic and innovation, Atlantis succumbed to a great cataclysm, sinking into the abyss where time and tide hold dominion. Now, its people—evolved to breathe the ocean’s embrace—live in harmony with the deep, guarding their knowledge fiercely with arcane technology and divine relics. Yet, rumors persist of dark forces stirring in the ruins, eldritch beings pressing against the city's mystical wards, and whispers that Atlantis is waking, preparing for its long-awaited return—or final descent into oblivion.
